pitch: Product Manager with engineering & entrepreneurship backgrounds and passion for solving real problems for the customers and businesses

About.section_data: Builder at heart and a Product Manager with Product Software Engineering experience in making primarily B2B SaaS products, services and tools in Real-time Multimedia Communications (VoIP), Automotive (Electric Vehicles) and Software Development Tools domains. Spent the last 1.5 years on studying Product Management in a Product Operating Model (how the best teams work) by making side-projects.

Projects.section_explanatory_text: Below is a list of my side-projects:

section_data.project_description: Built a GitHub-based portfolio template for Technical Product Managers and Engineers — so we could better sell ourselves in our resumes and interviews nowadays.

Added value and improved UX for already existing and selling on Amazon and Etsy “Life Calendar” product by adding data from World Health Organization and Human Mortality Database. Currently work with 2 interior designers to make a picture-like data-art object to decorate walls in apartments.
